profile.summary:
My personal mission is to improve the quality of life in India.

I have attempted to do this by working in industries that can bring large scale disruption e.g. mobile, consumer internet and IT in India and the APAC region. My passion for change has helped me to experience and learn by performing various roles like general management, sales, pre-sales, product management and business development.

Along this journey I have discovered that humility and collaboration are my natural traits. I have leveraged these to influence and empower individuals and teams to achieve their goals. 

In my current role, my responsibility is to create and scale partnerships and programs that enable LinkedIn product teams and businesses to maximize the value that LinkedIn delivers to its members and customers. We help create ecosystem strategies, execute partnerships, and program manage these partnerships and programs.
profile.headline: Partnerships@Linkedin, Building Trumsy

experience.description:
Lead partnerships and strategic alliances in APAC. Build and empower a team of high impact deal makers who manage a complex portfolio of Product and Revenue partnerships. Develop BD into a strategic growth tool for Linkedin in APAC. Collaborate with Asia Pacific Cross functional leaders to shape Linkedin strategy and execution.

Manage BD for the Linkedin R&D centres in Bangalore and Beijing. Support the product leaders in scaling their products globally via ecosystem strategy, alliances and partnerships. Collaborate with BD leaders in other regions for growth of products developed in Bangalore and Beijing R&D centres.
experience.title: Senior Director and Head of Business Development, Asia Pacific & China

experience.description:
Manage partnerships and strategic alliances team in APAC. Enable the team to deliver on ecosystem strategy for our business through the region. Develop partner strategies and programs to support product and global solutions teams. Execute and manage deals for consumer or monetisation growth.

Lead Global BD (Alliances and partnerships) for two product lines at Linkedin. 1) Lite Platforms 2) Face 2 Face products (Events, Biz Card Scanning, QR Code Scanning and Find Nearby. The Lite platform is a low footprint proposition built for patch products which optimises for quick page load times. The Face 2 Face group of products focus on delivering companion experience to Linkedin users when they interact real time in physical realm.
experience.title: Director & Head of Business Development - Asia Pacific and Japan

experience.description:
Responsible for alliances and partnerships for Linkedin in India and APAC (excluding China and Japan) 

Responsible for Linkedin growth via partnerships; user growth, engagement growth, revenue growth. 

As an integral part of the Linkedin global product organization responsible for working with startups in the talent, edtech, jobs and content space.

Liasoning with Govt ministries and industry bodies like CII, Ficci and Nasscom on helping find economic opportunity for Indians in the workforce. 

Working with established online players in the Jobs, Classified and Content space for mutually beneficial partnerships.
experience.title: Director & Head of Business Development - India, ANZ, SEA and Hong Kong
Diector & Head of Business Development - India, South East Asia (SEA) and Hong Kong

certifications.name: Becoming Head of Sales: Developing Your Playbook

volunteer.role: Member - Regional Committee on Skills and Education
volunteer.description: Advocacy and capacity building for various initiatives in the areas of Skills and education. Focussing on skilling for a better economic future for youth in India.
